backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with authorization mixins, typed models, and CRUD maps for profiles, clients, orders, entries, assets, documents, and APK download info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping APK download and admin update features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose across pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML document bootstrapping the React app by loading main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authorization gating, profile setup flow, and top-level layout and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/accounts/DailyEn: Form dialog for adding income or expense entries with validation, payment mode selection, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/assets/AssetForm: Form dialog for creating a new asset, handling validation and submit via useAddAsset.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a login button for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and handles states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Form dialog to add a new client with validation and submission via useAddClient.
frontend/src/components/common/ConfirmDe: Reusable confirmation dialog for deletions with loading state support.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Shows document sync status, including online/offline state, pending/failed operations, and retry options.
Renders a documents table with download and delete actions, including dialogs and size/date formatting.
Card for uploading PDF/Word/Excel files with validation, progress tracking, and onUpload callback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with navigation, header, footer, and user info display.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderForm: Provides a form for creating a new order with validation, mutation submission, and dialog UI.
frontend/src/components/settings/Allowli: Manages assigning user roles by principal ID with validation and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/settings/ApkDown: Displays APK download info with health checks, admin editing capabilities, and URL validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useApkDownloadInfo.ts: Fetches and updates APK download info using actor methods with validation and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useApkLinkHealthCheck: Provides a React Query hook to check APK link health using HEAD and no-CORS fallbacks with timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Fetches user role, profile, and admin status via actor and exposes authorization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentsOfflineQu: Manages an offline queue for document upload/delete operations with localStorage persistence and retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clients, orders, daily entries, and documents using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Accounts page rendering daily entries with filtering, add/delete actions, and authorization-based controls.
frontend/src/pages/AssetsPage.tsx: Displays a list of assets with add and delete actions, handling authorization and deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed client info and their filtered orders, with options to add or delete orders.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, add, and delete functionality, including navigation to client details.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Calculates and displays income, expenses, and balances in KPI cards and a monthly summary.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Manages documents with upload, delete, caching, and offline queue syncing.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays user profile and admin settings, including allowlist management and APK download options.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides helpers for getting start-of-day/month timestamps, checking if dates match today or this month, and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/documentsCache.ts: Implements localStorage caching for document metadata with get, set, and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into user-friendly message strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/validateHttpUrl.ts: Validates HTTP/HTTPS URLs and returns structured success or error results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining themes, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, known issues, architecture, and requirements.
